name: Saturday The 14th
description:
This is a game created by me and Myxo (she makes amazing art!). It's currently in development, and we will release a full version -- the current version was uploaded for a game jam. I need to update the game to signify that it's over, but for now: you can't progress past the third day. A few things in the environment change, but that's it.

Story:
You agree to housesit for someone but start to regret your decision when things go from creepy to terrifying.

Note:
The current build is very early in development. A lot of basic mechanics (such as the ability to do chores and the ability to collect and use items) have not yet been implemented. Right now, you can read the initial story, explore the house, progress through the days, and experience a few spooky shenanigans.
